summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests and helper utilities for validating the functionality of sparse tensor types (blockâ€‘sparse and CSR) provided by the xformers library. It creates sample tensors, seeds randomness, and checks operations such as batched matrix multiplication, masked multiplication, deep copying, module buffer registration, binary elementwise ops, and softmax handling on sparse data structures.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of sparse tensor operations used in deep learning models, thereby supporting efficient computation and reducing bugs in production deployments.
